channel.title: -----> RuneX <-----
channel.description:
[img]http://j.imagehost.org/0805/RuneX_Logo_Sneaky_Rs_style.gif[/img] Hi, Here new server RuneX. Its know like Quadro 7
we need a team the spots are:
1 or 2 Website PHP Coder 1 or 2 Graphics artist 1 Webclient maker (Realy Need) <--
plzz do the folowing:
Name: Age: Why we should take you?: Extra Info: what position you want take?:
Here the server:
Features:
-Perfect Hybridding -All 474 Items -Working 474 Godwars with all bosses and correct animation! -Active Forums,Games, And Chatbox -Good ingame Graphics! -All Special Attacks Coded! -Correct 474 Stance! -Ancients, Lunar and Regular Magic! -Many PK Spots! -100% Dueling and Staking! -Skillcapes Working -Dueling with Staking 100% -Pest Control -TzTok-Jad -All working skills! -Barrows (for Barrows armour) -Slayer Tower (Two floors) -New Option Tab -10xhit (Optional) -Names abouve heads (Optional) - And More!!!
New Option Tab. [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/6193/optiontab.mp4[/img]
Minigames. [img]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/2715/barrows.png[/img] [img]http://img517.imageshack.us/img517/6748/fightr.png[/img] [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/6938/pestf.png[/img]
Monsters. [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/7972/armx.png[/img] [img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/9781/bandosq.png[/img] [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/2992/choas.png[/img] [img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/7131/kbd.png[/img] [img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/756/sarad.png[/img] [img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/5066/zamot.png[/img]
Specials. [img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/5255/agse.png[/img] [img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/314/bgs.png[/img] [img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/6644/ddsi.png[/img] [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/7766/dfs.png[/img] [img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/1751/dragscimi.png[/img] [img]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/5316/sgs.png[/img] [img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/31/19258099.png[/img] [img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/8652/whipr.png[/img] [img]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/773/zgsp.png[/img]
Skills. All Skills Working Except Construction,Hunting and Summoning
[img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/9715/agility.png[/img] [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2991/cookx.jpg[/img] [img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/4158/crafi.png[/img] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/8250/farmingp.png[/img] [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/7021/fishingn.png[/img] [img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/6808/flet.png[/img] [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/4610/herbav.jpg[/img] [img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/5408/mining.png[/img] [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/2504/prayerf.jpg[/img] [img]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/3843/smithing.png[/img] [img]http://img815.imageshack.us/img815/5194/woodcuting.png[/img]
Magic Books
[img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/4281/ancients.jpg[/img] [img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/8274/normalhy.jpg[/img] [img]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/5548/lunarg.jpg[/img]
They Have alot more!!!

item.title: -----> RuneX <-----
item.dc:creator: @egyptmo21 egyptmo21
item.description:
@egyptmo21 wrote:

Trxkin:

[quote]Please read the rules. You need images or video as proof of this project being successful. I will give you 24 hours.

I think he gave a lot of pictures…[/quote]
He didnt have pictures before. And btw this is a leech of Rune-Fusion. Give Valentino credit.

EDIT: Btw rune-fusion has many bugs and glitches

Read full topic

item.title: -----> RuneX <-----
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

Please read the rules. You need images or video as proof of this project being successful. I will give you 24 hours.
I think he gave a lot of pictures...

Name: Camrin
Age:14
Why we should take you?: You should pick me because, i’m a good coder/co-owner. I’m been owner on many servers witch all have been successful. More than 450 players on daily.
Extra Info: I’m on 6-8 hours a day. and ill help out the server get players like i have in the past. you can contact me on msn: of sky: msn: czar101@hotmail.com skype: trxter101
what position you want take?:Coder/co-owner. Or head admin.

Read full topic
